Headline: #68 Northwest Highway Temporary Southbound Reroute near Northwest Hwy/Devon
ShortDescription: SB 68 NW Hwy buses are temp rerouted via: NW Hwy, Oliphant, Avondale, Devon and NW Hwy, due to, street blockage, near NW Hwy/Devon.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #68 Northwest Highway buses are temporarily rerouted via: Northwest Highway, Oliphant, Avondale, Devon and Northwest Hightway, due to street blockage, near Northwest Highway/Devon.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed near Jarvis
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near Jarvis due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near Jarvis due to a mechanical problem.

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
